鋪.definition: plank bed; place to sleep; shop; store; (old) relay station

鋪天蓋地.definition: lit. eclipsing the sky and blanketing the earth (idiom); fig. arriving in overwhelming quantities; engulfing; all-pervasive

鋪平.definition: to spread out (material); to pave (the way, a road etc)

鋪床.definition: to make a bed; to lay bedding

鋪攤.definition: to spread out; to display; to lay out a vendor's stall

鋪敘.definition: to explain all the details; complete narrative

鋪梗.definition: (Tw) to set the scene; to lay the groundwork; to pique the interest of one's audience

鋪炕.definition: to make a bed; to lay bedding

鋪衍.definition: to spread out widely; to disseminate

鋪設.definition: to lay (railroad tracks, carpet, pipeline); to install (wiring, cable); to construct (road, concrete slab)

鋪路.definition: to pave (with paving stones); to lay a road; (fig.) to lay the groundwork (for sth); to give a present to sb to ensure success

鋪陳.definition: to arrange; to spread out; to narrate in detail; to describe at great length; to elaborate

鋪面房.definition: store; front room of house serving as shop
